TopicTitle: A search instrument in the space ship builder

Articles.Content: Please add a search function to the building compatible whit mods because whit all the mods part i installed i have to search a lot to find a thing thank you.
Welcome to the forum, Khofax. I'm not clear what you're saying, but it looks like a suggestion, so your thread has been moved to the Suggestions subforum.

Please add a search function to the building compatible whit mods because whit all the mods part i installed i have to search a lot to find a thing thank you.

They're asking for a search function in the VAB/SPH; so they can search parts by name/description. Because they have a lot of part mods; and their part library is huge.

I believe some mods can do it; but it would be nifty in stock to some extent. The custom groupings UI is currently a mess though.
